segments.text: Daddy , I want to buy a ten-speed-sportsman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is it ? Is three hundred dollars enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not asking for money . I'm asking for your advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you've already grown up , son .
segments.speaker: S2
